title: Instrument Pointing
$comment: Providers should $ref this schema directly but Attitudes.schema.json instead.

attitude_quarternion.description: Representing attitude state of a spacecraft, using four element vector [q1, q2, q3, q4], composed of a scalar and 3 element unit vector.

dec.description: Dec pointing of the instrument Z axis

position_angle.description: Rotation angle [deg] between the spacecraft X-Z plane and the plane defined by the spacecraft X-axis and celestial North

ra.description: RA pointing of the instrument Z axis

roll.description: Roll [deg] of the instrument about its Z axis

rotation_rate.description: Rotational rate [rad/s] about the X, Y, and Z axes respectively

time.description: Time [UTC, ISO 8601] of this data, if different than the trigger time.
